Field Detail

SPEED

public static int SPEED
Constructor Detail

Camera

public Camera(TileEngine tileEngine)
The constructor of the Camera class Camera class moves the Tiles and Mover classes around according to the camera position. Uses the tile engine to retrieve the tiles to move.

Parameters:
tileEngine - TileEngine that is used to retrieve the tiles.

Camera

public Camera(TileEngine tileEngine,
              int speed)
The contructor of the Camera class Camera class moves the Tiles and Mover classes around according to the camera position. Uses the tile engine to retrieve the tiles to move.

Parameters:
tileEngine - TileEngine that is used to retrieve te tiles.
speed - the speed of the movement of the camera (Free movement)
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

follow

public void follow(Mover mover)
This methode will make this class follow the Mover you give.

Parameters:
mover - A Mover class or an extend of it. The Mover class is able to be followed.

move

public void move(double dirX,
                 double dirY)
This methode can be used to move the camera around the world. Make sure you don't move when you are following.

Parameters:
dirX - The direction x
dirY - The direction y

updateView

public void updateView()
This method will update the Tiles from the engine to match the view. Also it will update all the Movers classes in the wolrd. So objects move around with the camera. If an Actor class is added it will not move around with the camera. It has to be a class that is the Mover or a extend of the Mover class.
